nodes.text: Felucian Chieftains were a high-ranking position held by members of the Felucian species.

These chieftains were natives of Felucia and served as leaders to their tribes. They wore heavy, golden-colored armor and carried staffs, which they used as weapons against their enemies. Furthermore, as they were Force-sensitive, they were capable of using the ability as a ranged form of combat against threats. Some chieftains rode upon a Rancor.
Two Chieftains fought against Galen Marek and attempted to kill him during his second visit to Felucia.
The Chieftain does not feature in the PS2 version of the game.
